Article Name: As TikTok Ban Looms, White House Launches A New Account On The App
Description: In a move that can only be meant to change the optics related to TikTok’s future, the White House launched a new account on the platform.

Article Name: The Surprising $10 Billion Creator Secret: Small Audiences, Huge Paydays
Description: Kajabi creators have earned $10 billion by turning small, engaged audiences into big businesses proving you don’t need millions of followers to make millions.

Article Name: Satirical Posts On Facebook About Hurricane Erin Are Causing A Stir
Description: Unfortunately, a portion of the evacuation news is entirely accurate. Hurricane Erin does pose a threat as it moves through the Caribbean and toward Puerto Rico.

Article Name: Google Photos’ Elusive Tinder-Like Feature Pops Up For More Users
Description: Google’s elusive Tinder-style swiping feature surfaces again. Does it work for you?

Article Name: Taylor Swift Just Shared Some Wise Words About Social Media Obsession
Description: The episode was mostly focused on Swift making a huge album announcement, but it was interesting how quickly the topic switched over to using digital technology.

Article Name: The LinkedIn Profile Framework Every Coach Needs To Win More Clients
Description: Your LinkedIn profile isn't converting views into coaching clients. Fix that now. Learn the exact framework coaches use to book discovery calls and grow their business.

Article Name: Taylor Swift Appearance On ‘New Heights’ Produced Half A Billion Views
Description: The full podcast on YouTube generated 13 million views (and counting) alone, surpassing the podcast's prior record for an episode.

Article Name: Google Photos Gets Much-Needed Update Ahead Of Pixel 10 Launch
Description: Google Photos is rolling out design updates and new filtering options, aligning with the upcoming Pixel 10 launch.

Article Name: Taylor Swift Takes Kelce Brothers’ Podcast To New Heights
Description: Taylor Swift's New Heights appearance is a long-term boost for Travis Kelce's podcast, and potentially the entire podcasting industry.

Article Name: TikTok ‘Hamilton’ Trend Has Women Squeezing Out Of Windows And Dog Doors
Description: A "Hamilton" song gets reinterpreted as part of a viral TikTok craze featuring colonial costumes and hasty escapes. Even show creator Lin-Manuel Miranda joined the fun.
